entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers near midnight. Snow level 2300 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 60%

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
